message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $13,000 for it.
Thanks for your reply, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $13,000.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose $13,000 as the price for the product.
